title: Screen a Rental Applicant
description: A property manager must screen a potential tenant's application.

tasks.description: Run a credit check and background check on the applicant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains the applicant's credit score and criminal history.

tasks.description: Verify the applicant's employment and income.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the applicant meets the income requirement (e.g., 3x the rent).
Agent obtains references regarding the applicant's payment history and behavior.

tasks.description: Approve or deny the application based on the screening results and company policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a decision and communicates it to the applicant.
